name: Bistecca
desc: A grilled steak. High heat has locked the juices in, giving one high expectations for when the meat is cut open.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

value.name: Ricetta: bistecca
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Steak.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Bistecca deliziosa
value.desc: A grilled steak. Juicy, flavorsome, fragrant steak. One bite and you feel yourself come alive.

value.name: Bistecca sospetta
value.desc: A grilled steak. Its color is a little bleak, almost as if it feels sorry for itself for being a sorry excuse for a steak.

value.name: Amber
value.desc: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

value.name: Bistecca della Vigilante!
value.desc: Amber's specialty. One side is obviously uncooked. The other side gives off a subtle scent of something burnt. Close your eyes and have a big mouthful, just to keep Amber happy if nothing else.
